projects.title: Clarity Blog (Website)
projects.desc: Backend and Frontend authentication, account creation and profile customization system for a social media website. Created using MongoDB, Express, Node, React, and severall libraries.

projects.title: Anonymous Chat Site
projects.desc: Used websockets to send text and audio messages to an anonymous global chat. Created with a Vue frontend and a Go backend.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.desc: I created the website you're visiting right now over my break using React.

projects.title: Clarity Bot (Discord Bot)
projects.desc: One of my first personal projects was creating a discord bot using Python. This bot performed a variety of functions, including simulating raffles, and querying stock and github data.
